channel.title: Your son posts this picture on facebook
channel.description:
http://i.imgur.com/yor4TLZ.jpg
what do you do?
Seriously how would you handle it?

item.title: Your son posts this picture on facebook
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Cruel Truth, post:56, topic:480797”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=599035.msg4214574#msg4214574 date=1360047994]

[quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=599035.msg4214401#msg4214401 date=1360020620]

I personally didn’t know guys did this…but maybe it’s like chicks and he is “testing” or “seeing what’s it like” I wouldn’t worry about it though I mean after the first time he can’t sit down he will stop probably.

To all the guys inside here, have you ever test to see what it is like?
[/quote]cause any dude really admit to doing anything like that

Don’t underestimate people in here. I expect Frell to admit to that.

well you really dont feel anything until the morning
[/quote] so that’s why there is a saying like “if you don’t know want to know, don’t ask” :eek:[/quote]
And if you want to know, you ask.

Read full topic

item.title: Your son posts this picture on facebook
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:44, topic:480797”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=599035.msg4213425#msg4213425 date=1359901490]

I went through this faze because I had a lot of girls over. My mom would ask if I was gay and I could come out… like wtf. Some parents want their kids to be gay… idk but damn thank god my mom never asks that question anymore.

I know why my friends think I’m gay, but I have no idea why my mother thinks that.
[/quote]

Most likely because you sit when you take a piss, you fruit loop.[/quote]
Are you claiming that all Germans are gay?

Read full topic

item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

I went through this faze because I had a lot of girls over. My mom would ask if I was gay and I could come out… like wtf. Some parents want their kids to be gay… idk but damn thank god my mom never asks that question anymore.

I know why my friends think I’m gay, but I have no idea why my mother thinks that.

item.title: Your son posts this picture on facebook
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:34, topic:480797”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=599035.msg4211904#msg4211904 date=1359683858]

I’d go and ask him if he was gay or not…

Please not, it quite annoying when your parents (mother) ask you such a question (twice).

I… Don’t get it
[/quote]

his mom thinks he’s gay[/quote]

I went through this faze because I had a lot of girls over. My mom would ask if I was gay and I could come out… like wtf. Some parents want their kids to be gay… idk but damn thank god my mom never asks that question anymore.

Anyways… I would probably give my kid some playboy magazines or something like that. It’s not the gay part that affects me… posted before someone was talking about being a public whore… would defiantly bother me.

Read full topic
